Title: The Peak of Serenity - Continue Your Training
Description: The time has come for you to return to the Peak of Serenity to continue your training.  Use Zen Pilgrimage to return there and speak with Master Hight when you arrive.
ObjectivesText: Use Zen Pilgrimage to travel to the Peak of Serenity.  Speak to Master Hight in the Shrine of the Ox when you arrive.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak to Master Hight in the Shrine of the Ox.
